title: Regulation (EEC) No 2110/70 of the Council of 20 October 1970 extending the period of validity of Regulation (EEC) No 19/69 on the advance fixing of the levy on imports of olive oil
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2110/70 OF THE COUNCIL  of 20 October 1970  extending the period of validity of Regulation (EEC) No 19/69 on the advance fixing of the levy on imports of olive oil
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The second paragraph of Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 19/69 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1970.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 20 October 1970.
For the Council
The President
H.D. GRIESAU
(1)OJ No 172, 30.9.1966, p. 3025/66. (2)OJ No L 143, 1.7.1970, p. 1. (3)OJ No 197, 29.10.1966, p. 3393/66. (4)OJ No L 3, 7.1.1969, p. 2. (5)OJ No L 271, 29.10.1969, p. 8.
